metadata.title: CVE-2016-4438 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The REST plugin in Apache Struts 2 2.3.19 through 2.3.28.1 allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted expression.

criterions.comment: libstruts1.2-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
